Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Lexington
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cicero/Lexington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Laramie, Roosevelt, Cicero, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cicero/Lexington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
